statements: DELETE FROM GamingAccessories WHERE price > 100 AND quantity_in_stock < 50;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 100 AND accessory_name = 'Charger';
DELETE FROM accessory_trends WHERE trend_id = 50 OR trend_description LIKE '%popular%';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM sales_records WHERE sale_id = 100 AND quantity = 5;
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 100 AND accessory_id = 5;
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE accessory_id = 3 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
